mapper.select: SELECT quiz_id, content, option1, option2, option3, option4, created_user_id, created_at FROM quiz ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1
SELECT quiz_id, content, option1, option2, option3, option4, created_user_id, created_at FROM quiz WHERE quiz_id = #{quizId}

SELECT quiz_id, (SELECT answer FROM quiz WHERE quiz.quiz_id = quiz_result.quiz_id) AS answer, COUNT(CASE WHEN user_answer = 1 THEN 1 END) AS answer1, COUNT(CASE WHEN user_answer = 2 THEN 1 END) AS answer2, COUNT(CASE WHEN user_answer = 3 THEN 1 END) AS answer3, COUNT(CASE WHEN user_answer = 4 THEN 1 END) AS answer4, COUNT(CASE WHEN is_common_sense = 1 THEN 1 END) AS isCommonSense, COUNT(CASE WHEN is_common_sense = 0 THEN 1 END) AS notCommonSense FROM (SELECT * FROM quiz_user WHERE quiz_id = #{quizId}) as `quiz_result`
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quiz(content, option1, option2, option3, option4, answer, created_user_id) VALUES(#{content}, #{option1}, #{option2}, #{option3}, #{option4}, #{answer}, #{createdUserId})
